summary: C. Thomas Folkemer, M.D. was initially disciplined in 2010 for failing to meet medical care standards and inadequate record keeping, leading to a suspended license and probation with restrictions on pain management and prescribing certain medications. He subsequently violated these probationary terms by practicing pain management and inappropriately prescribing opiates and benzodiazepines for longer than three days in non-emergency situations. As a result of this violation, his medical license was permanently revoked.
